Method Detail

PrepareJail

public static void PrepareJail(JailPrisoner prisoner,
                               org.bukkit.entity.Player player)

Jail

public static void Jail(JailPrisoner prisoner,
                        org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Performs jailing of specified JailPrisoner. If you just want to jail someone, I recommend using JailAPI.jailPlayer, because it supports offline jail and it's easier to do.

Parameters:
prisoner - JailPrisoner class of the new prisoner. Must be already inserted into database
player - Player that will be teleported

UnJail

public static void UnJail(JailPrisoner prisoner,
                          org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Performs releasing of specified JailPrisoner. If you just want to release someone, I recommend using prisoner.release, because it supports offline release and it's easier to do.

Parameters:
prisoner - prisoner that will be released
player - Player that will be teleported

PrepareTransferAll

public static void PrepareTransferAll(JailZone jail)
Initiate transfer of every prisoner in specified jail zone to another nearest jail zone

PrepareTransferAll

public static void PrepareTransferAll(JailZone zone,
                                      java.lang.String target)
Initiate transfer of every prisoner in specified jail zone to another jail zone

Parameters:
target - Name of the destination jail zone

Transfer

public static void Transfer(JailPrisoner prisoner,
                            org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
Performs transfer of specified JailPrisoner. If you just want to transfer someone, I recommend using prisoner.transfer, because it supports offline transfer and it's easier to do.

Parameters:
prisoner - Prisoner that will be transfered
player - Player that will be teleported
